text:
#88thAirBaseWing leaders are set to host two town halls on back-to-back days to discuss the base's #COVID19 response and #vaccine distribution updates:
Jan. 27 at 4:30 p.m.: 88th ABW
Jan. 28 at 10 a.m.: @WrightPattMC
